name: diginomicaenterprisenews
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: enterprise news
Developer Terms of Use
des:
After invoking this skill with the phrase 'open enterprise news', you can do the following:

- Hear latest news headlines from Diginomica: you can say "hear/play today's news", "today's news" or just "news"
- Hear leadership content from our partners: you can say "hear/play new thought leadership content from our partners", "hear/play partners content" or "partners content"
- Hear Jon Reed's podcasts playlist: you can say "hear Jon Reed's podcasts", "play Jon Reed's podcasts" or just "Jon Reed's podcasts".

While hearing Jon Reed's podcast you can navigate through different episodes by saying "Alexa next" or "Alexa previous" and you can pause and resume at any point by saying "Alexa pause" or "Alexa continue/resume".
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
